  • Constructor Details

    • AprilTagDetectorJNI

      public AprilTagDetectorJNI()

  • Method Details

    • createApriltagDetector

      public static long createApriltagDetector(String tagFamily, float decimate, int threads)
      Create a new AprilTag detector
      Parameters:
      tagFamily - the tag family the detector will use
      decimate - the decimation factor
      threads - the number of threads to use
      Returns:
      a native pointer to the newly created detector

    • setApriltagDetectorDecimation

      public static void setApriltagDetectorDecimation(long ptrDetector, float decimate)
      Set the decimation parameter of a previously created AprilTag detector
      Parameters:
      ptrDetector - native pointer to an AprilTag detector, obtained from createApriltagDetector(String, float, int)
      decimate - the new decimation value

    • runApriltagDetector

      public static long runApriltagDetector(long ptrDetector, long ptrGreyscaleBuf, int width, int height)
      Run an AprilTag detector on a greyscale image
      Parameters:
      ptrDetector - native pointer to an AprilTag detector, obtained from createApriltagDetector(String, float, int)
      ptrGreyscaleBuf - native pointer to a greyscale image buffer
      width - the width of the greyscale buffer
      height - the height of the greyscale buffer
      Returns:
      a native pointer to a list of detections, or 0 if nothing was detected. If non-zero, must be freed with ApriltagDetectionJNI.freeDetectionList(long)

    • runAprilTagDetectorSimple

      public static ArrayList<AprilTagDetection> runAprilTagDetectorSimple(long ptrDetector, Mat grey, double tagSize, double fx, double fy, double cx, double cy)
      Run an AprilTag detector on a greyscale image
      Parameters:
      ptrDetector - native pointer to an AprilTag detector, obtained from createApriltagDetector(String, float, int)
      grey - a greyscale OpenCV Mat
      tagSize - size of the tag in meters
      fx - lens intrinsics fx
      fy - lens intrinsics fy
      cx - lens intrinsics cx
      cy - lens intrinsics cy
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of AprilTag detections. No care need be taken to release native detections.

    • releaseApriltagDetector

      public static void releaseApriltagDetector(long ptr)
      Release an AprilTag detector
      Parameters:
      ptr - native pointer to an AprilTag detector, obtained from createApriltagDetector(String, float, int)
